title: Drawing, "Design for Three Lamps", ca. 1855
medium: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor, tempera on tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in ink below each design: No 111. Lampe torse sur Trépied à feuilles; No 112. Lampe à Vignes sur Trépied vignes. / dessin moitié grandeur; No 113. Lampe à tête de bélier sur Trépied Console
creditline: Museum purchase from Pauline Riggs Noyes Fund
description: Designs for three lamps of ornamental bronze, surmounted by glass globes. Each one varies in design, but they all have leaf and foliage details and filigree work.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Three Lamps", ca. 1855.
ca. 1855. Graphite, pen and ink, brush and watercolor, tempera on tracing paper. Museum purchase from Pauline Riggs Noyes Fund. 1953-206-7.
